intension: Design a Facebook cover to promote Betty's Studio Sewing Day event, emphasizing on making cute aprons and pillows using various sewing tools. The color theme should be blue and wooden elements can be included.
globalcaption: The image features a table with a variety of sewing items on it. There are several pins scattered across the table, with some located near the top left corner, others in the middle, and a few more towards the right side. A pair of scissors can be seen on the left side of the table, and a needle is placed near the top right corner. \n\nIn addition to these sewing tools, there is a bowl situated in the middle of the table, and a cup is located towards the right side. The table appears to be a workspace for sewing and crafting activities.
keywords: sewing day, studio, tools, scissors, pillows, making, studio, blue, wooden, facebook, cover, fb, sewing

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a wooden table with various sewing items on it. There are several pins scattered across the table, with some located near the top left corner, others in the middle, and a few more towards the right side. A pair of scissors can be seen on the left side of the table, and a needle is placed near the top right corner. \n\nIn addition to these sewing tools, there is a heart-shaped item, possibly a heart-shaped pin cushion, situated in the middle of the table. The table appears to be a workspace for sewing and crafting activities
